content.body: Usually past messages under different rules are not (at least should not be) revealed as a default. The people that were talking before the changes relied at the rules at that point and everyone can't be reached for permission.

content.body: Yes, they're not, that was my point. (I *thought* they would be, because I didn't read the dialog very carefully and the options are structured in a slightly misleading way.)
